location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 62: Rawson Hart Boddam, Lawrence Nilson, Robert Sparks and Richard Church, Political and Secret Department at Bombay Castle, to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: This letter acknowledges the receipt of Edward Galley's recent correspondence, which reached Bombay by a dingy from Muscat. The letter requests information on the movement of any French ships of war into the Gulf.
